name: lazylibrarian
description: LazyLibrarian is an automated ebook and audiobook manager similar to Sonarr but for books. It tracks authors, manages wanted lists, and integrates with downloaders and metadata providers to build a self hosted library automatically.
features: Book Automation: Author tracking, Automatic downloads, Release monitoring. Build your ebook library automatically.
Metadata Integration: GoodReads support, Cover art, Book details. Rich information for every book.
Audiobook Support: Audiobook downloads, Dual format tracking, Unified library. Manage ebooks and audiobooks together.
Downloader Integration: NZB and torrent support, Quality preferences, Format selection. Flexible download options.
